updates.HtmlString: Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Updated foil chances. Now 15/67 chance a booster has a foil, includes basic lands, and it always replaces a common.
Evening: Prerelease: Added actual Prerelease seeded pack contents plus clan info cards.
Morning: Prerelease bugfixes: Logo fixed. Last booster is now Fate Regorged as intended. Seeded booster: now contains 15 cards (not 16), no Fate Reforged cards, and the Rare is a clan card.
Evening: Added boosters, basic land, and more cards.
Evening: Added the promos, tokens, and a lot more cards.
